channel.title: taste on babble

item.title: 038 - On Taste
item.description: There is a great Ira Glass quote about taste and how you build it. It rings true to my experience. Basically it says that even people with killer taste cannot produce up to their own standards when they are just starting out. They have a vision for something great, and they try to build it, but it turns out inevitably to look like shit. This can be discouraging, but fear not, goes the quote.
